title: Executive Order 7899-Authorizing the Appointment of Miss Amy G. Maher to a Position in the Social Security Board Without Regard to Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the provisions of paragraph Eighth of subdivision SECOND of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883, (22 Stat. 403, 404), it is hereby ordered that Miss Amy G. Maher may be appointed to a position as technical adviser in the Social Security Board without compliance with the requirements of the civil service rules.
This order is recommended by the Social Security Board.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7899-Authorizing the Appointment of Miss Amy G. Maher to a Position in the Social Security Board Without Regard to Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362892
